author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request does not meet the guidelines for auto-merging. Please make sure that you have read the [General registry README](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/master/README.md). The following guidelines were not met:

- Name does not meet all of the following: starts with an uppercase letter, ASCII alphanumerics only, not all letters are uppercase.
- Name is not at least five characters long
- Package name similar to 19 existing packages.
  <details>
  <summary>Similar package names</summary>
  
  1. Similar to AES. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2. Normalized visual distance 1.62 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
  2. Similar to ASE. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2. Normalized visual distance 1.97 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
  3. Similar to AWS. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2. Normalized visual distance 2.39 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
  4. Similar to AMD. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  5. Similar to CRC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  6. Similar to ADI. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  7. Similar to ECC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  8. Similar to SMC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  9. Similar to BBI. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  10. Similar to XCB. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  11. Similar to VQC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  12. Similar to Amb. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  13. Similar to Ant. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  14. Similar to BAT. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  15. Similar to ODBC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  16. Similar to EBIC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  17. Similar to JDBC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  18. Similar to GpABC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
  19. Similar to Cbc. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 1 between lowercased names is at or below cutoff of 1.

  </details>


Note that the guidelines are only required for the pull request to be merged automatically. However, it is **strongly recommended** to follow them, since otherwise the pull request needs to be manually reviewed and merged by a human.

After you have fixed the AutoMerge issues, simple retrigger Registrator, which will automatically update this pull request. You do not need to change the version number in your `Project.toml` file (unless of course the AutoMerge issue is that you skipped a version number, in which case you should change the version number).

If you do not want to fix the AutoMerge issues, please post a comment explaining why you would like this pull request to be manually merged.

Since you are registering a new package, please make sure that you have also read the package naming guidelines: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1



---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
I'd like to leave the name as ABC and have this manually merged, since this wraps the Berkeley project ABC which is a logic synthesis and verification program.
Closing the PR to rename pkg to BerkeleyABC

title: New package: ABC v1.1.0
